title: BEEN 3 HOURS SINCE SERVER ISSUES, WHERE ARE U RIOT?!?!
body: i havnt been able to log on for hours now still no sign of riot

replies.body: Have you still been unable to login? Looks like that server issue was fixed up in a couple hours, so if you're still having problems it's most likely an unrelated issue. Hit me back up and we can start troubleshooting if needed!
